t: Amazon.com: Nicky Bigs Novelties: Brand Story
s: Hello this is Nick Grossi with Nicky Bigs Novelties. Nicky Bigs Novelties is a Marsino's Costumes brand created by myself- Nicholas Grossi in 2017. The brand name was a nickname given to me from a dear friend.
Nicky bigs novelties offers an extensive selection of costumes, accessories, and decorations for every occasion and season.

Discover unique finds at Nicky Bigs Novelties! Explore our curated selection of novelty items and costumes directly linked to our Amazon store for easy shopping. Dive into a world where fun meets creativity with Nicky Bigs Novelties.

s: I created my own brand of novelty items because I was sick of the low quality items I was got from US vendors. I deal directly with our factories and control the quality.
